description: Instantly transform any room with our unique wall decals. Ideogram's wall decals are easy to install with our step by step instructions. Our wall decals look painted once installed! The easiest way to decorate any room in your house! Ideogram decals can be install on just about any smooth or lightly textured walls and glass surfaces. Durable to be installed both indoor and outdoor as well as on car windows. Our wall decals are removable, but not reusable. We only use the highest quality vinyl to create our wall decals for our customers!
